name: Cargo Collider
description:
Another in my series of mini games, this is a Tetris inspired game with the twist that the 'blocks' are shipping containers floating in space and must be nudged into position by a space ship.    Once the crates are assembled in a compact form you deploy beacons around them which will shift into position and teleport the crates away, awarding you points based on the filled space vs empty space.

The ship has a magnet on the front which will lock onto a crate when coming into contact with it, use this to help you maneuver the crates - and press shift to disengage the lock.

Press spacebar to deploy a beacon.  Beacons will create a force field between each other (and will not be able to be placed if there the path for the force field is blocked). Once the fourth beacon is placed they will form an enclosure and teleport any crates within their bounds.

 The force fields of the beacons can also be used as a walls that stop the movement of the crates.  Press C to clear any pylons you have placed.
